name: 05::Create A New Value For A Feature

actions.expectedResult: The "Attributes & Features" page is displayed correctly.

actions.action: Click the "Features" tab at the top of the page.
actions.expectedResult: The page switches to the features list.

actions.action: Click "Add new feature value" in the top-right corner.
actions.expectedResult: A new page appears containing a form to create a new value.
The dropdown list shows "Season" as the selected feature.

actions.action: Enter a specific value e.g. "Spring/Summer" in the "Value" field.
actions.expectedResult: The value "Spring/Summer" is entered in the field.
A "Successful creation" message is displayed at the top of the page.
